Description: Upper section of a painted pottery shabti of Djed-Khonsu(?), a Wʿb-priest of Amun(?) with a lappet-wig tied with a black fillet, a summarily modelled face with black eyes and crossed arms in relief holding black painted hoes; the back is decorated with a representation of a black seed-basket; the leg section has broken away.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore (?)
